ROOT.Insert: INSERT INTO Rooms (IDADV, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, SHORTDESCRIPTION, NN, NE, EE, SE, SS, SO, OO, NO, AA, BB) VALUES (@IDADV, @TITLE, @DESCRIPTION, @SHORTDESCRIPTION, @NN, @NE, @EE, @SE, @SS, @SO, @OO, @NO, @AA, @BB)
ROOT.Update: UPDATE Rooms SET IDADV=@IDADV, TITLE=@TITLE, DESCRIPTION=@DESCRIPTION, SHORTDESCRIPTION=@SHORTDESCRIPTION, NN=@NN, NE=@NE, EE=@EE, SE=@SE, SS=@SS, SO=@SO, OO=@OO, NO=@NO, AA=@AA, BB=@BB WHERE ID=@ID
